name: Downhill Struggle
description:
A 3d platforming game made in 1 week for the Weekly Game Jam 240

Roll your way through 6 levels while avoiding shooters, manoeuvring your way through spinning tubes and avoiding bouncing obstacles.

Instructions: WASD for movement, Hold left click and move the mouse for camera movement.

(Let me know if you manage to get to the end :) )

Music used: Path Less Travelled by Harris Heller
